name: MonsterMates
description:
MonsterMates is a game about meeting LGBT monsters, with a diverse cast of characters.

Follow one of the storylines and date one of the monsters who shy away from the others.

Made with:

- Writing: Léa "Nara" Eveno: https://www.behance.net/evenonaraf0a2

-Coding: Melz : https://twitter.com/Melzinoff

- Art: Luppy: (she doesn't have a link :c)

It was made in around one month as an end-year project. Feedback would be lovely, thanks! <3
